p: Headspace of plant material (A) and essential oil (B i C) were of artemisia ketone chemotype. In headspace sample of petroleum ether extract (D), the main component was camphene (25.6%), while, in sample obtained by steam distillation of petroleum ether extract (E), the main component was camphor (20.0%) and camphene was not detected. Four high volatile compounds, α-pinene, camphene, sabinene, and β-pinene, comprising 43.7% of sample D, were not found in sample E where steam distillation was applied.
